summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1267 for the improvement of First Avenue North, from Howe Street to Smith Street; Warren Avenue, from Howe Street to McGraw Street; Second Avenue North, from Howe Street to McGraw Street; Third Avenue North, from Howe Street to Crockett Street; Crockett Street, from Second Avenue North to Third Avenue North; McGraw Street, from Second Avenue North to First Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, etc., under Ordinance No. 13959 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
